chinese: 我可以进来吗?
english: Is it ok if I come in?

chinese: Yes.
english: Yes.

chinese: Hi. 你现在是16岁,这个事实不容置疑.
english: Hi. The indisputable fact is that you are sixteen.

chinese: 我们必须搞清楚你什么时候已经16岁了,
english: We're going to have to work out when you're already sixteen.

chinese: 什么时候才刚刚16岁.
english: And you're already sixteen.

chinese: 照你的说法,等我90岁的时候, 也不过才“刚刚”16岁.
english: According to you I'm going to be "only" sixteen until I'm ninety.

chinese: 你说得对.
english: You're right,

chinese: 我为你操心的时间肯定比你想知道的要长.
english: I will be worrying about you longer than you want to know.

chinese: 可我并不要你操心.
english: But I don't want you to worry.

chinese: 如果你非要为我操心的话这不能怪我.
english: It's not my fault if you do.

chinese: Well, 有些情况会比其他情况更令我们担心, Beth.
english: Well, some situations worry us more than others, Beth.

chinese: 这次旅行就是其中之一.
english: This trip is one.

chinese: 如果这令你失望的话,我很抱歉.
english: I'm sorry it's such a disappointment to you.

chinese: 真的很抱歉.
english: I really am.

chinese: 你那样说只是想示好, Daddy.
english: You're just saying that to be nice, Daddy.

chinese: 你打算什么时候才让我长大?
english: When are you going to let me grow up?

chinese: 相信我, 亲爱的,
english: Believe me, honey,

chinese: 不久以后你就会做你以前觉得不可能做的事情.
english: soon you'll be doing things you never thought possible.

chinese: -比如说,两年以后再 参加旅行... -两年！
english: -Say the trip were in two years... -Two years!

chinese: 那这两年我什么也不能干...
english: I can't do anything for two years...

chinese: 你听我说, 听我说, 那时你就18岁了,
english: Listen, listen. You'd be eighteen.

chinese: 准备就更充分了,
english: You'd be better prepared.

chinese: 出门旅行就不会有问题了.
english: There'd be no question about the trip.

chinese: 那我两年以后肯定能去吗?
english: So I can do it in two years?

chinese: 你保证?
english: Do you promise?

chinese: Oh boy. 你出生一分钟之的时候就这样了.
english: Oh boy. You've been doing this since you were a minute old.

chinese: 怎样了?
english: What?

chinese: 把我绕在你的小手指上任你摆布呀.
english: Wrapping me around your little finger.

chinese: 你保证吗?
english: Do you promise?
